page.title: 07NURSING HOME BOVEY TRACEY
page.content: {Heathfield House}is a residential home for the elderly. At present there are {14 residents}the youngest being 76 and the eldest 93 .The house is funded mainly by its residents .There are three floors, and a total of 9 bedrooms. The staff of the house are a {Matron}a{Matrons Assistant }2 experienced part time workers,a cook, and a cleaner.There is always a night-staff of 3,one of which must be an S.R.N.There is a small library in the house and a residents garden and the hairdresser,Chiropodist and womens institute call monthly. The daily routine is 6.00am start with a cup of tea in bed,8.00am the day staff arrive.9.00am.everyone gets up.Lunch is at 12.15 with tea and cakes at 3.00pm ,supper at 6.00pm and bed between 5.00pm and 8.00pm.
